mapper.insert: insert into exam_paper_release (exam_paper_release_id, exam_paper_id, administrator_id, exam_paper_release_time, exam_start_time, exam_end_time, notes) VALUES (#{examPaperRelease.examPaperReleaseId}, #{examPaperRelease.examPaperId}, #{examPaperRelease.administratorId}, #{examPaperRelease.examPaperReleaseTime}, #{examPaperRelease.examStartTime}, #{examPaperRelease.examEndTime}, #{examPaperRelease.notes})
